alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Hanover, southwestern Pender, southeastern Bladen, northeastern Brunswick and northeastern Columbus Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 406 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sandyfield, or 17 miles northwest of Leland, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, Northwest, Sandyfield, Point Caswell, Long Creek, Montague, Rooks, Malpass Corner, Currie, Freeman, Castle Hayne, The Borough, Delco, Riegelwood and East Arcadia. This includes Interstate 140 MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Bladen; Columbus; Inland Brunswick; Inland New Hanover; Inland Pender
